2085060.name: Nemesis - Class Pack
2085060.description:
DLC "Class Pack" – A New Way to Play!

Looking to explore Nemesis from a fresh perspective? The "Class Pack" DLC expands your adventure with:

  • 3 unique new classes:

    • Astromancer: Master the delicate balance between light and dark magic. A powerful magical class, equally effective in offense and support.

    • Gunslinger: Blend melee combat and ranged abilities with skills that don’t require a pistol, allowing you to shoot even while wielding melee weapons.

    • Berserker: A brutal, self-sufficient class designed to deal massive physical damage without relying on allies.

These classes are not more powerful than the base game classes; they simply provide exciting new gameplay styles to keep your experience fresh.

  • A strategic bonus: Start each run with +5 relics to give you a helpful boost early on.

  • 9 exclusive skins: Customize your heroes with unique designs that stand out.

The Class Pack is perfect for players eager to push their creativity and explore new strategies. Are you ready to take on the challenge with these new tools at your disposal?
